summary: Two families bond when their teenage sons are killed in an explosion at a suburban mall only to discover one of their children is the prime suspect.
cast: Mahnoor Baloch|Faran Tahir|Dendrie Taylor|John Heard|Sharon Washington|Patrick St. Esprit|Jordan Parrott|Sagar Parekh|Karl Antony|Judi Barton|Bruce Blau|Vint Carmona|Brian Danker|Dana Dowell|Shannon Finn|Gregory Freiberg|Rebecca Grayce|Joe Hakik|Jim Hechim|Jackie Hisaw|Mike Howard|Karen Kahn|Celik Kayalar|Adam Lazarre-White|Aeron Macintyre|Janelle Marie|Craig Marker|Aimee McCrary|Robert George Nelson|Robert Parnell|Montgomery Paulsen|Jeremiah Peartree|Charles Post|Vivek Tatineni|Shruti Tewari|Vilma Vitanza|Jeffrey Weissman|Maaika Westen|Michael Ray Wisely|Derek W. title: Torn
